duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee the IT Infrastructure based on company-wide security policies and manage and improve the IT Infrastructure to raise IT service level.
Maintain cleanliness at work-site in accordance with 5S3R Standards: Sort, Set in order, Shine, Standardize, Sustain Right Location, Right Quantity, Right Container.
Follow existing cleaning SOP’s during downtime, which includes cleaning designated machines and/or surrounding work areas.
Execute the monitoring system of IT Infrastructure to secure the operational continuity of Applications including Manufacturing Execution System & Other Systems.
Implement projects to enhance the operational continuity of IT Infrastructure Network Circuit, Application Server and Clients, etc.
Implement projects to enhance information Security Server Security, Network Security, and Client Security.
Support IT Investment, IT Expense, IT Assets, and IT Helpdesk.
Execute HQ Common System related to Portal, Groupware, and Domain.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Information Technology or related field required, MBA or MS preferred, or equivalent relevant experience.
